item.title: Giorgio Armani’s Greatest Design Was His Independent Vision as a Founder
item.description: While he watched his counterparts roll up into luxury conglomerates, the fashion designer successfully retained his billion-dollar company.

item.title: How to Make Sure You See Inc. Articles First on Google
item.description: Google’s new ‘Preferred Sources’ feature lets you select which news outlets appear first in search results. Here’s how it works—and how to add Inc.

item.title: Anthropic Will Pay Out $1.5 Billion Over Pirated AI Training Content
item.description: The landmark settlement could mark a turning point in the legal battles between AI companies and creative professionals.

item.title: As Domestic Onshoring Agenda Gets Traction, SBA Launches New Loan Program
item.description: The new program appears to resemble other Small Business Administration supports, but has a specific focus.

item.title: Top Interview Strategies That Helps Executives Get the Offer
item.description: Not all interviewers in the hiring process are created equal. Executives who understand the role of each individual are the ones who land the role.
